Got it! Adding a new field titled "Neither".

In the conversation, the user interacted with the AI assistant to implement various features and UI elements in an application. The user requested the addition of a neon field, which the AI acknowledged, and subsequently asked about the placement and function of the neon field within the app. The user agreed to implement it for decorative purposes, and the AI noted this.

Furthermore, the user requested to add a text input field labeled "Teio", which included form validation and placeholder text, while options for integrated features such as autocomplete and an info icon were offered but not checked. The user also asked to add a "Watch Video Demonstration" button and a "Size Guide," along with features like a "Favorites" button.

The dialogue progressed with the user requesting a button titled "Eyes" and the AI confirming its addition. Features for a "Forget Everything" form were suggested by the AI. The user continued with more requests, including a "Contact Us" button, a "Free" button, and a "Forget Password" field, with the AI acknowledging each request.

Questions regarding the placement and functionality of certain buttons were posed, such as where to place the "Free" button and its intended action. The conversation then shifted to the user adding a user registration and login form, including options for password strength and email verification, with corresponding features offered.

At each point, the AI provided lists of additional potential features, creating a collaborative feedback loop where the user selected desirable options and the AI took note of each selection. The assistant requested further clarification on the project at the end, indicating a desire to understand the broader context of the user's requests.
